select count(*) from PRODUCT p join GOLFCC g on p.CC_ID = g.CC_ID join MEMBERLIST m on p.USER_NO = m.USER_NO JOIN LOCATION l on l.LOC_ID = g.LOC_ID where P_PDATE > sysdate
and ${emergency} <= 0.5
and g.loc_id = #{loc_id}
and ${productDivision} like '%'||#{productValue}||'%'

SELECT CC_NAME,CC_IMG,P_ID,P_PDATE,P_UPLOADDATE,P_MAXPEOPLE,P_HOLE,P_CADDYYN,P_BABYN,P_CARTYN,P_PRICE,P_CONTENT,m.USER_NO user_no,P_VCOUNT,NICKNAME,substr(PHONE_ID,1,3)||'-'||substr(PHONE_ID,4,4)||'-'||substr(PHONE_ID,8,4) PHONE_ID,LOC_NAME,g.LOC_ID loc_id, case when P_PDATE-sysdate <= 0.5 then '긴급' end emergency FROM PRODUCT p join GOLFCC g on p.CC_ID = g.CC_ID join MEMBERLIST m on p.USER_NO = m.USER_NO JOIN LOCATION l on l.LOC_ID = g.LOC_ID where P_PDATE > sysdate
and ${emergency} <= 0.5
and g.loc_id = #{loc_id}
and ${productDivision} like '%'||#{productValue}||'%'
order by ${productOrderby} asc
order by p_pdate asc

select to_char(p_pdate,'yyyy/MM/dd HH24:mm') p_pdate, cc_name, nickname, phone_id, p_price, loc_name from (select * from ( select rownum rnum, p.p_pdate, g.cc_name, m.nickname, m.phone_id, l.loc_name, p.p_price from product p join golfcc g on p.cc_id = g.cc_id join memberList m on p.user_no = m.user_no join location l on l.loc_id = g.loc_id ) where rnum <= #{end} ) where rnum >= #{start}
and ${product} like '%'||#{adminSearch}||'%'

SELECT g.CC_NAME CC_NAME,g.CC_IMG CC_IMG,l.LOC_ID LOC_ID,to_char(p.P_PDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') P_PDATE,to_char(p.P_UPLOADDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') P_UPLOADDATE,p.P_PRICE P_PRICE,to_char(o.O_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') O_DATE,o.O_AMOUNT O_AMOUNT,o.O_PRICE O_PRICE,m.NICKNAME NICKNAME,m.PHONE_ID PHONE_ID,m.EMAIL EMAIL FROM ORDERLIST o join PRODUCT p on p.P_ID = o.P_ID join MEMBERLIST m on o.USER_NO = m.USER_NO join GOLFCC g on p.CC_ID = g.CC_ID join LOCATION l on g.LOC_ID=l.LOC_ID WHERE p.USER_NO = #{user_no} order by P_PDATE

SELECT CC_NAME,CC_IMG,P_ID,P_PDATE,P_UPLOADDATE,P_MAXPEOPLE,P_HOLE,P_CADDYYN,P_BABYN,P_CARTYN,P_PRICE,P_CONTENT,m.USER_NO user_no,P_VCOUNT,NICKNAME,substr(PHONE_ID,1,3)||'-'||substr(PHONE_ID,4,4)||'-'||substr(PHONE_ID,8,4) PHONE_ID,LOC_NAME,g.LOC_ID loc_id, case when P_PDATE-sysdate <= 0.5 then '긴급' end emergency FROM PRODUCT p join GOLFCC g on p.CC_ID = g.CC_ID join MEMBERLIST m on p.USER_NO = m.USER_NO JOIN LOCATION l on l.LOC_ID = g.LOC_ID where P_PDATE > sysdate and p.USER_NO=#{user_no} order by P_PDATE
